column5: May 26 General Motors Co said on Monday it will recall almost 46
column6: 000 cars in Australia and New Zealand after routine testing found an automatic seatbelt tightening mechanism may fail in an accident as a result of unexpected friction with a bolt.

column2: Pork DNA found in two chocolate products of Cadbury Malaysia -report May 26 Chocolate maker Cadbury Malaysia
column3: a part of Mondelez International Inc
column4: on Monday recalled two chocolate products after they tested positive for traces of pork DNA
column5: the Nikkei Asian Review website reported.
